meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the outoffice picnic with her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The team had an outoffice meeting in the park.
meanings.sent3: The outoffice team-building exercise was a fun change of pace.
meanings.sent4: His outoffice perspective brought fresh ideas to the project.
meanings.sent5: The outoffice atmosphere was relaxing and inspiring.

meanings.definition: A message sent from an email account when the user is away from the office.
meanings.sent1: I set up an outoffice reply for my vacation period.
meanings.sent2: She received an outoffice notification about the delayed response.
meanings.sent3: The outoffice auto-reply made people think I was on a secret mission.
meanings.sent4: His inbox was flooded with outoffice messages during his absence.
meanings.sent5: The outoffice email contained important details for the clients.
